name: HeroCarouselLogo
description: Full-screen hero section with auto-playing carousel background, large text logo at bottom that scales to fill container width, description and button row above, with progress bars and linear gradient blur overlay.

description.example: Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library

slides.note: Array of CarouselSlide objects. Each slide can have imageSrc, videoSrc, imageAlt, videoAriaLabel. Video takes precedence over image if both provided in a slide.

showDimOverlay.note: Adds semi-transparent dark overlay (bg-background/20) over background media for improved text and logo contrast

structure.href: string - Link destination (optional). External URLs (https://, http://, www.) open in new tab. Internal values (e.g., 'about', 'contact') scroll to #about, #contact sections
structure.props: Partial<ButtonPropsForVariant> - Additional button props like className, textClassName (optional)

buttonRules.note: Buttons are required (cannot be empty array). Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius is controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius (options: 'sharp', 'rounded', 'soft', 'pill'). All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level to maintain consistent styling across the entire site.

propsSchema.buttons: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.slides: Array<{ imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }> - Carousel slide items

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="pill">
  <HeroCarouselLogo 
    logoText="WEBILD" 
    description="Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library" 
    buttons={[{ text: 'Get Started', href: 'https://github.com' }, { text: 'Learn More', href: 'about' }]} 
    slides={[{ imageSrc: '/slide1.jpg', imageAlt: 'Slide 1' }, { imageSrc: '/slide2.jpg', imageAlt: 'Slide 2' }, { imageSrc: '/slide3.jpg', imageAlt: 'Slide 3' }]}
    autoplayDelay={5000}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
dont: Do not use less than 5 items
